channel.title: GTD on Craig Citro
channel.description: Recent content in GTD on Craig Citro

item.title: Managing Bookmarks
item.description: Like everyone, I often run into interesting content that I don't have time to read then and there. Bookmarks to the rescue! But then I end up with a mountain of bookmarks. After years of experimenting, I've finally come up with an effective system. The System Bookmark things in chrome (or your browser of choice) as you find them. Roughly once a month, make a few folders to try and do some basic grouping.
